Properties

inMpage

true if mpage=true appears in the URL

jquery. mpages.js

An object for the retrieval and transformation of data for MPages

Will implement an interface for accessing data of both production and test systems

Summary
Functions
constructorBasic constructor for MPages object.
getDataLoad data for inclusion in an MPage.

Functions

constructor

Basic constructor for MPages object.

Parameters

optionsOverloadable param.  Accepts either the options.url item, or an object of options

Options

dataAny data to pass on a POST
urlThe actual thing to run.  If not in CCL Land, urlPrefix will be prepended
urlPrefixThis allows us to specify an alternate location (like a flat file)
typeOptional, default = “POST”
asyncOptional, default = false
timeoutOptional, default = 30000
dataTypeOptional, default = ‘json’ // valid types: text, xml, json
errorOptional, global callback to fire on xhr error state function will pass: xhr, status, exception
successOptional, global callback to fire on xhr success state function will pass: data, status, xhr
additionaldefined by http://jquery.com/

Example

mp = new $.MPage({
    data: '^MINE^, value($PAT_Personid$), value($VIS_Encntrid$)',
    urlPrefix: '/main/apps/mpages/ccldata/',
    error: function(x, s, e){
        console.debug(e);
    }
});

getData

jQuery.MPage.prototype.getData = function(options,
success)

Load data for inclusion in an MPage.  Dynamically determines environment and overloads the jQuery.xhr as necessary.

Parameters

optionsOverloadable param.  Accepts either the options.url item, or an object of options
successOptional, function to fire on success of the xhr request

Options

dataAny data to pass on a POST
urlThe actual thing to run.  If not in CCL Land, urlPrefix will be prepended
urlPrefixThis allows us to specify an alternate location (like a flat file)
typeOptional, default = “POST”
asyncOptional, default = false
timeoutOptional, default = 30000
dataTypeOptional, default = ‘json’ // valid types: text, xml, json
errorOptional, global callback to fire on xhr error state function will pass: xhr, status, exception
successOptional, global callback to fire on xhr success state function will pass: data, status, xhr
additionaldefined by http://jquery.com/

Example

//Simple Example
mp = new $.MPage({
    data: '^MINE^, value($PAT_Personid$), value($VIS_Encntrid$)',
    urlPrefix: '/main/apps/mpages/ccldata/',
    error: function(x, s, e){
        console.debug(e);
    }
});
mp.getData('name_of_my_program', function(){alert('w00t!');});

//complex Example
mp = new $.MPage();
mp.getData({
    data: '^MINE^, value($PAT_Personid$), value($VIS_Encntrid$)'
    url: 'name_of_my_program',
    urlPrefix: 'http://my.server.com/'
    error: function(xhr, status, exception){
        alert('Horrible things have occurred: ' + xhr.statusText);
    },
    success: function(data, status, xhr){
        alert('w00t!');
    },
});
